description:
Live Show Mondays brings you the conclusion of the October live show that featured Amber Rayne, Rain DeGrey, and special guest co-top Ariel X.
This is the wind-down from an intense 3 hours of non stop BDSM. We put both girls against the wall and flog them with all the power we have. Ariel X want to fucks Amber, so she does. This is just what the girls need to come back to the real world. This is what happens in real BDSM play. Enjoy the post interview and get an insight into what the girls endured and how they processed it.
title: Amber Rayne, Rain DeGrey, and Ariel X
